title: Are you kidding me?
body: Ranked quo with a friend. Everything is fine in champion select. As soon as we get to lobby, BOOM black screen! Few minutes later, my friend says the game has started.....Still black screen.... A few minutes later when they remake....Still  black screen. Eventually I open task manager and close league. I comeback to see I have afk penalty... I'm being punished for your client acting up? I honestly don't think that's very fair... Having to wait 20 min 5x even though I didn't afk. The only thing I did was try and fix the bug before they remade but with no success.

replies.body: This happens to me as well.Earning  a leavebuster due to that "black screen" issue isn't fair.
I think it is something on the server side because this issue is happening more and more, but only today and it is not in just one area.

A constant connection is required to run League in-game and via client, so connection issues are super common here.  Symptoms might seem similar but it doesn't mean they are all related.  I'm happy to continue assisting you in your own thread if you have further questions about your specific issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qfgn9z9h,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-01-21T18:08:29.588+0000)

> A constant connection is required to run League in-game and via client, so connection issues are super common here.  Symptoms might seem similar but it doesn't mean they are all related.  I'm happy to continue assisting you in your own thread if you have further questions about your specific issue.

I would hope that all the cases are related, because if they are not it could mean that there are multiple issues causing the same problem, if you get what I mean.

We can't remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties but I'm happy to help troubleshoot this.  Are you on the updated client?  Either your network is failing and can't download assets in champion select or you had a bad installation.  If this was on the updated client, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) should fix it up.  Make sure to test it out in a custom game to prevent further penalties.
